name: electron-mouse-mover
description: Electron app that moves mouse in random directions

scripts.build:electron: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && vite build --config electron/vite.config.ts && vite build --config electron/vite.preload.config.ts
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:electron && concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run build:electron && electron-builder
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run build:electron && NODE_ENV=production electron .
scripts.grant-access: open 'x-apple.systempreferences:com.apple.preference.security?Privacy_Accessibility' && echo '\nðŸ“‹ Path to add: $(pwd)/node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app\nClick the + button and navigate to the path above'
